attributes.action: Remove the need to display front number plates
attributes.additional_details:
97% of U.K. traffic enforcement cameras are for rear number plates (TfL) 
On sports cars etc the number plates are difficult to read due to the curved shape making them unnecessary 
Atleast 19 countries allow no front number plates and the people are still surviving!!
attributes.background:
Almost all U.K. cameras read number plates from the back not the front so you need a front one
Car makers for design the cars for front plates anymore due to their ugly Look 
Supercars have no where to put them legally
They are a hassle and old fashioned
